title: Cognitive Load Theory-Based Computerized Test (CBT) Design Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: A course to learn CBT design methods using multimedia elements in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, including smart device sharing and project-based learning activities in classrooms

learning_goals: Learners can optimize the visual layout of CBT (Computer-Based Testing) items according to CTML (Computer-Based Test Markup Language) principles.
Learners can utilize tools to measure cognitive load in test items based on Cognitive Load Theory (CLT).
Learners can design multimedia CBT items accessible in smartphone environments.
